home.banner: “We come from the market with a clear vision of what companies really need to be #1... in the market.”

execSearch.title: Executive Search
execSearch.slug: Our executive search solution use all our set of tools to provide our clients with the right executive at the right time but most importantly with the mindset needed to perfectly fit into his/her new leadership role

targetedSearch.title: Targeted Search
targetedSearch.slug: Our targeted search solution is a simplified path to selecting the right executive: faster and direct. allows our clients to fill their leadership positions from within a reduced but well suited comparable candidate base

leadership.title: Leadership Assessment
leadership.slug:
Our leadership assessment solution combines our two distinctive differentiators: state of the art executive business simulation with having the candidates straight talk for 90 minutes with our LAB members, experienced top HR executives and CEOS. The outcome of both sessions is a comparable easy to read individual scorecard.

Our leadership assessment is an agile and smart way to compare internal vs external candidates and also to validate potential promotions.

groupSimulation.title: Group Simulations
groupSimulation.slug:
Our group simulations are challenging sessions for management board/leadership team members to interact either live or virtually with their peers.

A "hands on way" to sharpen decision making skills and fuel constructive discussions as well as an idea generation forum.

The groups can work individually or into cleverly designed teams and can drive additional collaboration and team integrations dynamics.

howEBSworks.slug:
Under our simulation setting the individual is challenged for 3.5 hours and 4 "years" of leading an organization.

The leader takes several decisions on sales & marketing, investments, operations,talent and many other that impact an array of indicators which eventually are reflected in an comprehensive but easy to read comparable individual scorecard

whyEBS.slug:
Executive business simulation is a powerful tool that inmerses the person into a situation that truly resembles real lihe decision making.

Using a business sim instead of phycological or IQ tests makes a world of difference when assessing or selecting candidates. It is a practical and direct way of identifying exceptional leaders who will transform performance.

Moreover, if an airliner pilot goes through a flight simulator on average every 6 months why shouldn't an executive? A great number of careers under his/her responsibility and massive but limited resources depend upon complex decisions.

ourSIM.slug:
Under our executive business simulation setting the following skills and candidates are practiced by the individual:

  • Prioritizing Information
  • Judgement
  • Global perspective
  • Adaptability
  • Complexity management
  • Risk taking
  • Shaping strategy
  • Technology understanding
  • Financial sharpness

And additionally in group simulations:

  • Critical thinking
  • Collaboration
  • Influencing & negotiation
  • Cross functional interactions
